name: EasyQR
author: Muhammad Jauhari Bin Saealal

sections.description:
This widget allow you to display your contact information (or other such as sms to, email to, note, MEcard and etc) in qr code form.

This widget works by displaying a qrcode which was defined by blogger to put contact information. Get qr contact information format from http://qrgenerator.mindster.net This web site allow you to generate most contact information format such as ME card,telephone number,url,wifi access code, send sms, send email and etc.
sections.installation:
You can download and install easyqr by using the built in WordPress plugin installer. If you download easyqr manually, make sure it is uploaded to “/wp-content/plugins/easyqr/”.

Activate the plug in from “Plugins” admin panel using the “Activate” link.

After successfully activate the plug in, go to link “widgets” under “appearance” menu.
Drag easyqr widget into suitable location and configure it with your data. To get more contact information format, feel free to visit http://qrgenerator.mindster.net
sections.changelog:
1.0:
New release of EasyQR

1.0.1:
Add size feature
